abstract: DoubleLine, the new firm created by Jeffrey Gundlach, the star money manager who was ousted from the TCW Group two weeks ago, has stolen another key executive from the mutual fund giant.
snippet: DoubleLine, the new firm created by Jeffrey Gundlach, the star money manager who was ousted from the TCW Group two weeks ago, has stolen another key executive from the mutual fund giant.
lead_paragraph: Update | 7:35 p.m. DoubleLine, the new firm created by Jeffrey Gundlach, the star money manager who was ousted from the TCW Group two weeks ago, has hired another key executive from the mutual fund giant.

headline.main: Gundlach Takes Another Top Executive from TCW
